TestCase.Name: Verify Account Summary of a Bank Account
TestCase.Author: cuong.tran

Keyword.Name: NewCombineVariable
Keyword.Description: New Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable, NewCombineVariable is only different number of parameter with the old one

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine, range input: 2 --> 17

Keyword.Name: NewCombineVariable
Keyword.Description: New Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable, NewCombineVariable is only different number of parameter with the old one

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine, range input: 2 --> 17

Keyword.Param: SELECT V.AccountName AS AccountName, V.CompanyNumber AS CompanyNumber, V.AccountNumber AS AccountNumber FROM dbo.WXVirtualCardAccounts V INNER JOIN dbo.BankAccounts B ON V.BankAccountId = B.BankAccountId WHERE B.AccountName = '

Keyword.Name: QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile
Keyword.Description: Query DB then store the table results to a file

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: String query1 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: String query2 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: String query3 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sOutputResult2File
Param.Description: Solving the query result then store to a text file, split each of rows to a line, separate each of columns by " || "

Keyword.Name: GetDBColumnIntoString
Keyword.Description: Get Column into String With defined separator, reuse output of kw QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile

Param.Name: sInputFile
Param.Description: Path to file need to parse, file should be from result of kw QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile

Param.Name: sSeparator
Param.Description: provide separator to combine each of column into string, default will use ";"

Param.Name: sColumnVar1
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar1 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar2
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar2 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar3
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar3 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar4
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar4 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar5
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar5 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar6
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar6 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar7
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar7 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar8
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar8 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar9
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar9 variable

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Keyword.Name: ReplaceStringInFile
Keyword.Description: Replace String By String in a file (Images\Utils\1.png)

Param.Name: sSourceFilePath
Param.Description: Source File name need to replace string by string , LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Name: sStringNeedToReplace
Param.Description: String need to find and replace in file

Param.Name: sNewString
Param.Description: New string need to replace string found above

Param.Name: sDestinationFilePath
Param.Description: KW will Save As new file after replace, give your out file

Keyword.Name: QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile2
Keyword.Description: Query DB then store the table results to a file

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1

Param.Description: String query3 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sOutputResult2File
Param.Description: Solving the query result then store to a text file, split each of rows to a line, separate each of columns by " || "

Keyword.Name: GetDBColumnIntoString
Keyword.Description: Get Column into String With defined separator, reuse output of kw QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile

Param.Name: sInputFile
Param.Description: Path to file need to parse, file should be from result of kw QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile

Param.Name: sSeparator
Param.Description: provide separator to combine each of column into string, default will use ";"

Param.Name: sColumnVar1
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar1 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar2
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar2 variable

Param.Name: sColumnVar3
Param.Description: get column with Column Name or Column Order provided, then store to sColumnVar3 variable

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Login to AP outsource webpagee

Keyword.Name: GoToPayments
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payments Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Payments Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: VCardDashBoard_AccountSummary
Keyword.Description: Verify Account Summary on VCard Dashboard screen (Images\Customer\Payment\VCardDashBoard_AccountSummary.png)

Param.Name: sVCardAccount
Param.Description: Select a Virtual Card Account from list, input Account Name or Account Code or full text

Param.Name: sBankInfo
Param.Description: Verify an account from Account Summary Table, provide Bank Name or Account Name or Account Code or fulltext

Param.Name: sVCardOutStanding
Param.Description: Verify amount of Virtual Cards Outstanding

Param.Name: sDepositInTransit
Param.Description: Verify amount of Deposits In Transit

Param.Name: sCreditInTransit
Param.Description: Verify amount of Credits In Transit

Param.Name: sCardProviderBalance
Param.Description: Verify amount of Card Provider Account Balance

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Expand(correct_name_of_group) to click expanding the group, e.g.: Expand(Virtual Cards Outstanding;Deposits In Transit)

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

TestCase.Name: Verify Card Status Summary of a Bank Account
TestCase.Author: cuong.tran

Keyword.Name: VCardDashBoard_StatusSummary
Keyword.Description: Verify Status Summary on VCard Dashboard screen (Images\Customer\Payment\VCardDashBoard_StatusSummary.png)

Param.Name: sVCardAccount
Param.Description: Select a Virtual Card Account from list, input Account Name or Account Code or full text

Param.Name: sStatus
Param.Description: Status need to check, separate by ";" if want to check multiple statuses

Param.Name: sNumOfCard
Param.Description: Verify Number of card corresponding to the Statuses provided in above

Param.Name: sTotalAmount
Param.Description: Verify total amount corresponding to the Statuses provided in above

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickStatus(sStatusName) to click on Status Name

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Param.Description: Solving the query result then store to a text file, split each of rows to a line, separate each of columns by " || "

Keyword.Description: Get Column into String With defined separator, reuse output of kw QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile

Param.Name: sInputFile
Param.Description: Path to file need to parse, file should be from result of kw QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile

Param.Name: sSeparator

Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payments Feature

Keyword.Name: VCardDashBoard_AccountSummary
Keyword.Description: Verify Account Summary on VCard Dashboard screen (Images\Customer\Payment\VCardDashBoard_AccountSummary.png)

Param.Name: sVCardAccount
Param.Description: Select a Virtual Card Account from list, input Account Name or Account Code or full text

Param.Name: sBankInfo
Param.Description: Verify an account from Account Summary Table, provide Bank Name or Account Name or Account Code or fulltext

Param.Name: sVCardOutStanding
Param.Description: Verify amount of Virtual Cards Outstanding

Param.Name: sDepositInTransit
Param.Description: Verify amount of Deposits In Transit

Param.Name: sCreditInTransit
Param.Description: Verify amount of Credits In Transit

Param.Name: sCardProviderBalance
Param.Description: Verify amount of Card Provider Account Balance

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Expand(correct_name_of_group) to click expanding the group, e.g.: Expand(Virtual Cards Outstanding;Deposits In Transit)

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

TestCase.Name: Verify Account Summary of a Bank Account
TestCase.Author: cuong.tran

Keyword.Name: VCardDashBoard_StatusSummary
Keyword.Description: Verify Status Summary on VCard Dashboard screen (Images\Customer\Payment\VCardDashBoard_StatusSummary.png)

Param.Name: sVCardAccount
Param.Description: Select a Virtual Card Account from list, input Account Name or Account Code or full text

Param.Name: sStatus
Param.Description: Status need to check, separate by ";" if want to check multiple statuses

Param.Name: sNumOfCard
Param.Description: Verify Number of card corresponding to the Statuses provided in above

Param.Name: sTotalAmount
Param.Description: Verify total amount corresponding to the Statuses provided in above

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickStatus(sStatusName) to click on Status Name

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser
